snippet: A Polish European Parliament lawmaker may face punishment after telling the legislature that women should earn less than men because they are weaker, smaller and "less intelligent."...

headline.main: The Surprisingly Lively Home of a Controversial Artist
headline.print_headline: The Surprisingly Lively Home of a Controversial Artist

lead_paragraph: A Polish European Parliament lawmaker may face punishment after telling the legislature that women should earn less than men because they are weaker, smaller and "less intelligent."
